attributes.action: make it necessary to contain fish in a tank full of water when aboard a vessel to stop unnecessary deaths of fish that cannot be used for human consumption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent news report showed hundreds of dead fish being thrown back into the sea because of a restriction set by the EU to help the fish regain population, this was a good step by the EU but is not working because the vessels are throwing back fish that they are not allowed to take and these fish are dead anyway.

If these fish were contained in a tank of water they would not die and would be thrown back into the North Sea alive and the population of fish would rise.


You may search for news reports as i am not allowed to include one myself.
